alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 3:21PM CST until January 01 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... East central Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 321 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tuscumbia, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Rogersville, Killen, Lexington, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville and Anderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama.
